name: Vladimir Putin
nextStep: Further constitutional amendments to extend power
shortBio: Vladimir Putin is a Russian politician and former intelligence officer who has served as President of Russia since 2012, previously holding the position from 2000 to 2008.
educationBackground: Leningrad State University (LLB), Leningrad Mining Institute (Kandidat Nauk)

name: Kim Jong-un
nextStep: Continued military expansion and nuclear development
shortBio: Kim Jong-un is the Supreme Leader of North Korea, having assumed office in 2011 following the death of his father, Kim Jong-il.
educationBackground: International School of Berne, Kim Il-Sung National War College

name: Xi Jinping
nextStep: Increased surveillance and control over society
shortBio: Xi Jinping is a Chinese politician who has been serving as General Secretary of the Communist party of China since 2012 and President of China since 2013.
educationBackground: Tsinghua University (Chemical Engineering), Doctoral degree in law (Marxism)

name: Recep Tayyip Erdoğan
nextStep: Further suppression of opposition and media
shortBio: Recep Tayyip Erdoğan is a Turkish politician who has been serving as President of Turkey since 2014, previously serving as Prime Minister from 2003 to 2014.
highestAcademicQualification: Bachelor's degree in Economics and Commercial Sciences

name: Nicolás Maduro
nextStep: Continued economic control and military loyalty
shortBio: Nicolás Maduro is a Venezuelan politician who has been serving as President of Venezuela since 2013, following the death of Hugo Chávez.

name: Bashar al-Assad
nextStep: Strengthening alliances with Russia and Iran
shortBio: Bashar al-Assad is a Syrian politician and military officer who has been serving as President of Syria since 2000.
educationBackground: Damascus University (MD), specialized in ophthalmology in London

name: Alexander Lukashenko
nextStep: Increased repression of protests and opposition
shortBio: Alexander Lukashenko is a Belarusian politician who has been serving as President of Belarus since 1994.
educationBackground: Mogilev Pedagogical Institute, Belarusian Agricultural Academy

name: Abdel Fattah el-Sisi
shortBio: Abdel Fattah el-Sisi is an Egyptian politician and retired military officer who has been serving as President of Egypt since 2014.

name: Mohammed bin Salman
nextStep: Continued crackdown on dissent and reform opposition
shortBio: Mohammed bin Salman is the Crown Prince and Prime Minister of Saudi Arabia, serving as the de facto ruler of the country.

name: Daniel Ortega
shortBio: Daniel Ortega is a Nicaraguan politician who has been serving as President of Nicaragua since 2007, previously holding the position from 1985 to 1990.

name: Viktor Orbán
nextStep: Further consolidation of power and control over media
shortBio: Viktor Orbán is a Hungarian politician who has been serving as Prime Minister of Hungary since 2010, previously holding the position from 1998 to 2002.
educationBackground: Eötvös Loránd University (Law), University of Oxford (Political Science)

name: Donald Trump
nextStep: Further consolidation of power and control over media
shortBio: Donald Trump is an American politician and businessman who served as the 45th President of the United States from 2017 to 2021.
educationBackground: University of Pennsylvania (Wharton School of Business)
